column2: Demo Questionnaire illustrating use of CQL for simple queries such as CBC and Vital Signs and additional complex queries.

column10: Return each sub extension display except the text extension as a single string. E.g: "White, American Indian or Alaska Native, Asian, Shoshone, Filipino" (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/Patient-example.html)
Return only the text extension value. E.g.: "Mixed" (http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/Patient-example.html)
If no ethnicity at all located in Patient resource, set answer as "Unknown". If code 2135-2 in ombCategory extension, set answer to "Yes", else "No".
